faq_1_q: How quickly can I create a quote?
faq_1_a: With templates and the product catalog, an average quote takes 5-10 minutes. Automatic pricing and discount management saves additional time.
faq_2_a: You can set up automatic reminders that notify you or your sales rep about open quotes after X days. The system also tracks when the customer opened the quote.
faq_3_q: Can it integrate with my existing invoicing software?
faq_3_a: Yes, the system integrates with Billingo, Számlázz.hu and other popular Hungarian invoicing programs. NAV online data reporting is automatic.
faq_4_q: Can I manage custom price lists per customer group?
faq_4_a: Yes, Professional and Enterprise packages support multi-level price lists: reseller, VIP, standard prices, as well as customer group and volume discounts.
faq_5_q: What happens at the end of the trial period?
faq_5_a: After the 14-day trial, you can choose the right package. Your data is preserved, nothing is lost. If you don't want to continue, your account is simply deactivated.
faq_6_q: Does it connect to the CRM module?
faq_6_a: Yes, the Sales and CRM modules are fully integrated. Customers, quotes and orders sync automatically, and you can see the complete customer history.
faq_7_q: How many users can I add?
faq_7_a: There's no user limit — you can add as many team members as you need. Pricing is per user, so you only pay for actual usage.
faq_8_a: Sales dashboard, product and customer analysis, sales rep performance, conversion rates, revenue forecast, campaign ROI. The Professional package also allows custom reports.
